statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 1 \\ -3 \\ 0 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 2 \\ 0 \\ 2 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 6 \\ 3 \\ -9 \\ 0 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -1 \\ -3 \\ 3 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -20 \\ -7 \\ 33 \\ 4 \\ -7 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
